description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Bothwell, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Heritage Tasmania Countryside Retreat just an Hour from Hobart
hotels.description: Let romance find you at the blissfully secluded Ratho Farm, a boutique country retreat hidden in Tasmania’s lush central highlands. Ideally located a scenic one-hour drive north of Hobart, this charming heritage homestead offers a collection of lavish rooms, all surrounded by the manicured greens of Australia’s oldest golf course. There's simply no finer place to discover the region's charming collection of fine distilleries, wineries and delicious local produce.

seo.title: Hoteles en Bothwell - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Bothwell, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
